ValidationRule.description: Only Sr.Deputy can Enter or Update Case Closed Date on BOFE Cases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (NOT(ISBLANK(Case_Closed_Date__c)) && ISCHANGED( Case_Closed_Date__c)), NOT($Permission.BOFE_Senior_Deputy), NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') ), LEFT(RecordType.Name, 4) ='BOFE' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Senior Deputy can enter or update Case Closed Date
